inputs.name: number
inputs.description: Number or date to get information about. Possible values: an integer, 'random', day of year in the form month/day, 'today'.

inputs.name: type
inputs.description: Type of information to retrieve. Possible values: 'trivia', 'math', 'date', 'year'. Default value is 'trivia'.

outputs.name: result
outputs.displayName: Information about requested number or date.
